#summary Documentation for building and running built-in TREX regression tests

= Introduction =
TREX has several regression tests used to verify correct behavior. See TestHarness for more details.

= Details =

== Building and Executing the Tests ==
To run the built-in TREX regression tests do the following:
 # Export the environment variables listed in DevConfig
 # Go to the test directory
{{{
cd $TREX/agent/test
}}}
 # Build and execute the tests
{{{
jam run-agent-module-tests
}}}

If all the tests succeed to build and run, the above command should produce output similar to:
{{{
C++ /path/to/TREX/agent/test/module-tests_g.o 
C++ /path/to/TREX/agent/test/GamePlayAdapter_g.o 
C++ /path/to/TREX/agent/test/RecallAdapter_g.o 
Link /path/to/TREX/agent/test/agent-module-tests_g_rt 
Chmod1 /path/to/TREX/agent/test/agent-module-tests_g_rt 
ExecuteTarget RUN_agent-module-tests_g_rt 
}}}

== Verbose Test Output ==
To see the result of each individual test, build the tests as is done above, and then open:
{{{
$TREX/agent/test/RUN_agent-module-tests_g_rt.output
}}}

If the tests succeeded, the above file should contain output similar to:
{{{
